product_name: Sugoi Swim Racer Contrast Swimsuit - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Sugoi Swim Racer Contrast Swimsuit offers the stretch, support and comfort you need to focus on your stroke. Mechanical-stretch polyester fabric provides excellent recovery and extreme resistance to chlorine degradation. Flatlock seams reduce abrasion, bolster muscle support and ensure a streamlined look and feel. Racerback has keyhole detail. The Sugoi Swim Racer Contrast Swimsuit for women features a front lining to enhance coverage. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Sugoi Swim Racer Contrast Swimsuit offers the stretch, support and comfort you need to focus on your stroke.
